title: Win a VIP London experience with Qatar
text:
Win a VIP London experience with Qatar 23 July 2015 Qatar Tourism Authority is offering prizes including dinner at Nobu and a Harrods shopping spree You must be a registered user to access this page. Please register for free using the option below or if you are already registered logon below. Sign In Please do not complete the following form field for security reasons. Email Address Sign in Register today 
It’s free and it’s easy! Sign-up to get access all areas to ttgdigital.com, including: 
• Breaking industry news 
Stay connected and stay informed with ttgdigital.com Subscribe to TTG Aviation Marketing Account Manager – Manchester Airport 
Manchester Airport Group | Manchester | Competitive 
M.A.G keep 42 million passengers on the move from four of the UK's leading airports -Manchester, London Stansted, East Midlands, and Bournemouth. At Manchester Airport we keep 22 million passengers on the move to over 200 global destinations every year. Imagine being part of our fast growing airport with over 19,000 colleagues on site, and enormously exciting projects like the landmark £800m Airport City development in the pipeline. Imagine being responsible for the kind of tactical and strategic sales and marketing plans that keep an inspirational and high-achieving business like ours in the air.
